name: Sainnth

attributes.attribute: forced to race with the king’s horses
father of the goddess or heroine Macha
little else is known of him

sources: Monaghan, Patricia. The Encyclopedia of Celtic Mythology and Folklore. Checkmark Books, 2008.
text: An Irish hero named Sainnth appears in various texts as the father of the goddess or heroine Macha. Macha, an otherworldly woman, was compelled to race against the king’s horses. Apart from this legend, not much information regarding Sainnth is available.
